General.Name: Dolphin International Bhd
General.Description: Dolphin International Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, engineers, develops, and sells electro-automation, pneumatic, hydraulic, hardware, and software systems for the palm oil milling sector worldwide. The company operates through Palm Oil Milling, Trading and Services, Food and Beverage, and Trading segments. Its automation products include transfer carriage systems, cage indexer systems, sterilizer door and integrated drawbridge with articulated indexer systems, back pressure receiver stabilizer systems, cage tipper system with tipper-hopper control systems, digester level control systems, and Dolphin intelligent screw press control systems. The company's hydraulic products comprise hydraulic operated loading ramp door control systems, hydraulic twin drive conveyors, hydraulic cage feeder chute systems, and hydraulic power packs. It also provides software solutions, such as sterilizer process automation system; intelligent process automation and data acquisition system, which comprise iWEIGH, iGRADE, iLAB, iSMS, CEMS, and iPRODUCTION applications; and Robotic Rapid Equilibrated Sterilization Technology, an automated sterilization system. In addition, the company offers water dilution control system, which automatically regulates the precise amount of water that is infused to stabilize the crude oil mixture; silo and hopper weighing system that facilitates compression weighing; and tank level sensor for level measurement of liquid stored in a storage tank. Further, it engages of trading of food related products; operation of restaurant; and trading, wholesale, and import of alcohol related products. Dolphin International Berhad was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
